# **Data preparation**

Download the demo data and [refer this article](https://tidymass.github.io/tidymass/articles/demo_data.html).

![](figures/Screen-Shot-2022-01-13-at-10.33.07-PM.png)

# **Positive mode**

```{r,eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
library(massprocesser)
```
```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
massprocesser::process_data(
  path = "mzxml_ms1_data/POS",
  polarity = "positive",
  ppm = 10,
  peakwidth = c(10, 60),
  threads = 4,
  output_tic = TRUE,
  output_bpc = TRUE,
  output_rt_correction_plot = TRUE,
  min_fraction = 0.5,
  group_for_figure = "QC"
)
```

# **Negative mode**

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
massprocesser::process_data(
  path = "mzxml_ms1_data/NEG",
  polarity = "negative",
  ppm = 10,
  peakwidth = c(10, 60),
  threads = 4,
  output_tic = TRUE,
  output_bpc = TRUE,
  output_rt_correction_plot = TRUE,
  min_fraction = 0.5,
  group_for_figure = "QC"
)
```
